extension.name: RokAjaxSearch
extension.author: RocketTheme, LLC
extension.description: RokAjaxSearch is an ajaxian searcher that displays the results immediately and allows to choose the proper one.

field.description:
Relative path to your search page.
Example: index.php?option=com_search
field.label: Search page URL.
field.name: search_page

field.description:
Relative path to your advanced search page.
Example: index.php?option=com_search&view=search
field.label: Advanced Search page URL.
field.name: adv_search_page

field.description: Enabling this will allow you to use Google API Search for searching the web via RokAjaxSearch. Note that the API Key is needed
field.label: Google Web Search
field.name: websearch

field.description: Enabling this will allow you to use Google API Search for searching blogs content via RokAjaxSearch. Note that the API Key is needed
field.label: Google Blog Search
field.name: blogsearch

field.description: Enabling this will allow you to use Google API Search for searching images via RokAjaxSearch. Note that the API Key is needed
field.label: Google Images Search
field.name: imagesearch

field.description: Enabling this will allow you to use Google API Search for searching vidoes via RokAjaxSearch. Note that the API Key is needed
field.label: Google Videos Search
field.name: videosearch

field.description: In order to use RokAjaxSearch Web Search, you need a Google Ajax Search API Key. You can generate one for free at: http://code.google.com/apis/ajaxsearch/signup.html
field.label: Google Ajax Search API Key
field.name: websearch_api

field.description: Set this option to yes, if you want to show the pagination on google's results.
field.label: Show Pagination
field.name: show_pagination

field.description: Search results will be restricted to results based on the safesearch value
field.label: Google SafeSearch
field.name: safesearch

field.description: Image sizes to search for, works only when Image Search is enabled.
field.label: Image Size to search
field.name: image_size

field.description: Set this option to yes, if you want to show the estimated google results count.
field.label: Show Estimated
field.name: show_estimated

field.description: If you want to hide one or more div tags on your page, input div ids here, seperate with space.
field.label: Hide div id(s)
field.name: hide_divs

field.description: Set this option to yes, if you want a text to appear at the bottom of the result list that links to com_search page.
field.label: Link to all results
field.name: include_link

field.description: Set this option to yes, if you want to show the description on each result item.
field.label: Show Description
field.name: show_description

field.description: Set this option to yes, if you want category and section to show up under each title.
field.label: Include (Category/Section)
field.name: include_category

field.description: Set this option to yes, if you want the read more link to show up under the description.
field.label: Show Read More link
field.name: show_readmore
